programme.title: My College Girls
programme.desc: Teacher Tony, a dedicated and disciplined educator, would do anything to help his students excel through. However, everything changes when one of his students became pregnant.

programme.title: Beyond Forgiveness
programme.desc: After Obinna lost is ability to get a woman pregnant, he banks on faith and fate, but he is not ready to believe his wife when the time comes.

programme.title: City Husband
programme.desc: Chekwube is going through a lot in her fathers hands because she refuse to bring home a befitting husband for home.

programme.title: Ti-Ghana Island
programme.desc: War breaks out TI Island as the kingpin wants Alex to marry his troublesome daughter and leaves his lover. Will Alex accept the offer?

programme.title: On My Wish
programme.desc: Arinze adamantly prevents anyone from burying his father, fearing suspicion of his involvement in a cult. For nearly two years, he faces relentless attacks for his decision.

programme.title: Chetam
programme.desc: Nnanna and Adanna make a decision that changes their fate, Ojigijaga meddles with the gods. .

programme.title: Dunu-Okofia
programme.desc: During the great festival of Dunukofia, a young man is about to go to war for the sake of the woman he loves. However, his grandfather reveals to him the story of his ancestors.

programme.title: But Why Her
programme.desc: Freds attitude to life is crazy, and he takes it from his father. Without correction he gets worse and his mother is up against his father sleeping with their maid.

programme.title: Just A Miss-Take
programme.desc: Chucks falls in love with Amaka without knowing that it is Amara, her twin. Now the truth is out, will he marry Amara or fight back for Amaka?

programme.title: One Man
programme.desc: Nkechi and Amara are sisters who love each other but are separated because of poverty. They will unite again just for Nkechi to do the unthinkable.

programme.title: The Wizards Love
programme.desc: Onyinye longs for marriage, but a deadly vow binds her to a powerful wizard, and breaking it may cost her life.

programme.title: Sacrifice For Royalty
programme.desc: Nneka sacrifice her education for her man, Prince Gozie, this love makes him promise her marriage. Will he keep to that promise?

programme.title: Love Unbound
programme.desc: With her daughter adding to her troubles and Mmasi making strides in his life, Helen grapples with the weight of her past actions while her future hangs precariously in the balance.

programme.title: The Palace Gate
programme.desc: A king pleads with Okoye, the gatekeeper not to abandon his post, gripped by the fear of losing everything, as his daughter, Kamsi, brings turmoil to the kingdom and threatens his throne.

programme.title: Veiled Destiny
programme.desc: Nkemdilim rejects five suitors all because of her decision to become a reverend sister, but Chukwudubem will not give up as he feels that she is under a spiritual spell.

programme.title: Entangled Truth
programme.desc: Nze and Samantha, once deeply in love are separated by lifes challenges. Despite this, Nze remained loyal to her. But the worse is yet to happen.

programme.title: Ghetto Lord
programme.desc: Ashana and his mom Ogbolu terrorize the entire community. Now that theres a new sheriff in town, the ghetto lords will have to bow.

programme.title: Flaws
programme.desc: Emma and his friends are having a lot of drama in their marriages, but all is about to change as Emma devises a means to bring peace to his home by cheating on his wife.

programme.title: Akugbe
programme.desc: Odiase wins a wrestling contest and the king bless him bountifully with a land, including handing him his sister. Will it change Odiase?

programme.title: First Wife
programme.desc: The hate mama has for her twin sister Martha is overwhelming. She stands in for her and accepts her bride price, now she is hell bent on marrying her sisters husband.

programme.title: The Billionaire Cook
programme.desc: Alicias rich father never wanted her, he only accepted her when Rays father promised to marry her to his only son. Little did everyone know that she is wolf in sheeps clothes.
